name: internshala-scraper
title: Internshala Scraper
description: Scrape internship listings from Internshala based on custom filters like job category, location, work from home options, and more. Collect detailed information about internships including titles, companies, locations, stipends, durations, and hiring status.
readme:
Internshala Scraper that collects internship data with customizable filters.

This actor scrapes internship listings from Internshala based on parameters you provide. You can search for internships by job category, location, work-from-home status, part-time options, and minimum stipend requirements.

The data collected includes job titles, company names, locations, stipend amounts, durations, and additional information like 'actively hiring' status.

actively_hiring.description: Whether the company is actively hiring

early_applicant.description: Whether it's marked for early applicants

apply_link.description: Link to apply for the internship

input.title: Input schema for the Internshala Scraper

max_results.title: Maximum Results
max_results.description: Maximum number of internships to collect

job_category.title: Job Category
job_category.description: Category of internships to search for (e.g., Software Development, Marketing)

work_from_home.title: Work From Home
work_from_home.description: Search for work from home internships

location.title: Location
location.description: Location for internships (used if work from home is false)

stipend.title: Minimum Stipend
stipend.description: Minimum stipend requirement (leave empty if not applicable)

pages_to_scrape.title: Pages to Scrape
pages_to_scrape.description: Maximum number of pages to scrape
